response.original_title: ANGERME Murota Mizuki・Sasaki Rikako FC Event 2018
response.overview: ANGERME Murota Mizuki・Sasaki Rikako FC Event 2018 (アンジュルム 室田瑞希・佐々木莉佳子FCイベント2018) was a fanclub event featuring the 3rd generation members of ANGERME which was held to celebrate the 4th anniversary of their debut. It took place on October 4, 2018 at Shinagawa Stellar Ball.  The deadline to pre-order the fanclub-exclusive DVD was on December 27, 2018[1] and it was released to fanclub members on February 26, 2019.
response.title: ANGERME Murota Mizuki・Sasaki Rikako FC Event 2018
